questions.quote: I-I-I don't like the opera. What are they singing for? Who sings? You got something to say, say it!
What I said? I say stupid things all the time I can't go two minutes without saying stupid things.
I'm takin' it, I'm takin' the place. I'm gonna take it, this is gonna be my new place. I'm livin' here...I'm movin'.
"She's with a man twice her age." "He doesn't look like he's got much money either."
Do you see what this is turning in to? Do I need this. I have to get out of this thing.
I'll tell you, but don't ask her anything about her kid, she a little off.
Oh, I don't know. I told them her death takes place in the shadow of new life. She's not really dead if we find a way to remember her.
This is it! It happened to me, Jerry! I was sitting in the restaurant, the two nut jobs were talking - I couldn't take it any more. I got up, and  I bop into this woman..
Well, congratulations my friend. You know, I'm sorry I missed the grand re-opening. I was out of town for about a week.
